text: The Mask Falls (German: Die Maske fällt) is a 1931 American drama film directed by William Dieterle and starring Lissy Arna, Anton Pointner and Karl Etlinger.Waldman p.88 It is the German-language remake of the 1930 film The Way of All Men. ==Cast== * Lissy Arna * Anton Pointner * Karl Etlinger * Carla Bartheel * Ulrich Steindorff * Salka Viertel * Charlotte Hagenbruch * Leon Janney * Paul Weigel * Arno Frey * Anders Van Haden * Leo White * Louis King * Pat O'Malley ==References== ==Bibliography== * Waldman, Harry. Missing Reels: Lost Films of American and European Cinema.
